Package edu.missouri.bayesianEvaluator

Contains classes to train and evaluate a Bayesian Network.

Package edu.missouri.bayesianEvaluator Description

Contains classes to train and evaluate a Bayesian Network. Bayesian networks may be manually constructed (using software such as JavaBayes or SamIam) or algorithmically (using methods like bayesianConstructor.DomainKnowledge.variableDependency(Double)). The network need not be trained (i.e. the conditional probability tables don't need to have been computed)
Version:
0.09 2016-04-10

Version history

Ver# date Changes
0.09 2016-04-10 Added Trainer#conformToNetwork(weka.core.Instances, weka.classifiers.bayes.BayesNet, boolean). Trainer is now version 0.08
0.08 2016-04-09 Added Trainer#reorderAttributes(weka.core.Instances, java.util.List). to reduce the chance that weka.classifiers.bayes.BayesNet.estimateCPTs() will swap the node names. Trainer is now version 0.07
0.07 2016-04-08 Improved user feedback in Trainer#main(String[]). Trainer is now version 0.06
0.06 2016-04-08 Added Trainer#filterByCriterion(String, weka.core.Instances, int) Trainer#restrictToAttributeSet(weka.core.Instances, java.util.Collection) Trainer#discretizeToBayes(weka.core.Instances, weka.classifiers.bayes.BayesNet, boolean) and Trainer#getAttributeNames(weka.core.Instances) to allow callers to do what Trainer#main(String[]) does. Trainer is now version 0.05
0.05 2016-04-06 Trainer#main(String[]) now outputs results. Trainer is now version 0.04
0.04 2016-04-02 Trainer#main(String[]) now runs with no conflicts. Trainer is now version 0.03
0.03 2016-04-02 Modified Trainer#main(String[]) in an attempt to remove nodes that exist in the data file, but not in the Bayesian network. Trainer is now version 0.02
0.02 2016-04-02 Added Trainer; moved XMLBIF loading calls in BifUpdate#main(String[]) to BifUpdate#loadBayesNet(String). BifUpdate is now version 0.02
0.01 2016-04-01 Package created with BifUpdate
Author:
Fernando J. Torre-Mora
